divs: Sighting DetailsThis is to the person who submitted the Old Faithful Webcam - the lights do not surprise me. Several times during last year when I would pull up the webcam (during the day) there would be unusual objects in the sky. I did save several of the photos to our computer server. (Unfortunately, there was a huge flood in the building where the server was kept and I lost all the photos that were saved. It was a very freak flood that we have spent over 5 months and many thousands of dollars recovering from.) Keep checking the webcam!
